text: This land was blessed by the white comet.
and the people prospered beneath the blessed shower that fell from the heavens.
Until the day the comet turned crimson red,
In its darkest hour, the world was ultimately saved by the miracle of the Miraculous Nine.
With their work complete, the Nine entered a deep slumber in a faraway land known as the World's End.
It is said the source of their miraculous power still remains in this land, even to this day.
A new tale is about to unfold.
One guided from the heavens by the luminous, pearly tail of the white comet.
